revised_title: Description and Properties of the Gymnotus Electricus, or Electrical Eel
tldr: The author describes the physical appearance and unique properties of the Gymnotus Electricus, or Electrical Eel. The fish has the ability to give an electrical shock to humans and can swim forward or backward with equal ease. It also has a remarkable ability to lengthen or shorten its body and has a distinct external structure with four different longitudinal parts.
